attributes.action: Save the Pubs! Open the Pubs in Warwickshire during Tier 3!
attributes.additional_details: Pubs and Restaurants in Warwickshire are struggling. Now that it has been publically announced that Warwickshire is in the Tier 3 category this means that Pubs and restaurants that were very close to having to close permanently, will have to go through with it. We need to save these local businesses
attributes.background: Pubs contribute a significant amount to the economy, £22.9bn annually. 1 job in brewing generates 21 jobs in associated businesses including 18 jobs in pubs, 1 job in agriculture, 1 job in the supply chain, 1 job in retail. 82% of beer consumed in Britain is brewed in one of around 2000 breweries.
